page.title: 18OUR CHURCH
page.content: St Michaels Parish Church is situated just above the old school. All around it is the graveyard. It has two doors, one at the front with a path leading from the front gates to the door. There are two glass windows, one at the back and one at the front. The minister is called Mr Higham who has just recently begun. There is a bell tower which cannot be reached because the steps have collapsed. It can still be rung by a long rope and rings out every Sunday at 10.15 am. Although the church has many seats not alot of them are full because the numbers have dropped. This means that St Michaels Church has to share a minister and continually has to have coffee evenings and charity evenings to collect more money.
